data.title: Critical and Historical Essays, Vol. 1
data.meta_description: Essays which appeared in the Edinburgh Review between 1825-1831. They are on such topics as Milton, Machiavelli, Southey, Johnson, and other topics.
data.text:
Thomas Babington, Lord Macaulay (author)

Essays which appeared in the Edinburgh Review between 1825-1831. They are on such topics as Milton, Machiavelli, Southey, Johnson, and other topics.

EBook PDF

This text-based PDF or EBook was created from the HTML version of this book and is part of the Portable Library of Liberty.

ePub

ePub standard file for your iPad or any e-reader compatible with that format

Facsimile PDF

This is a facsimile or image-based PDF made from scans of the original book.

Kindle

This is an E-book formatted for Amazon Kindle devices.

Citation

Critical and Historical Essays contributed to the Edinburgh Review, 5th ed. in 3 vols. (London: Longman, Brown, Green, and Longmans, 1848). Vol. 1.

Copyright

The text is in the public domain.
